hero_text: Ideas and Commentary for Developing a Grand Strategy for a Better World.
name: Relentless Liberty
paid_subscription_benefits: Post comments and join the community
author_bio:
Strategy and policy consultant.
Ten-year veteran of the US Army and National Guard.
Six years advising and training Ukrainian military.
BBA from University of Wisconsin
MA in Strategic Studies from Norwich University.
